search_results.query: What do i need to go fly fishing?

snippet.title: Pineapple-Mango Salsa over Grilled Halibut
snippet.description: Luscious mango nectar combined with pineapple chunks and diced fresh mango make a sweet but zesty marinade for halibut. Mixed with bell pepper, cilantro and lime peel this marinade renders the fish flavorful and moist.
